thread.title_full: Joe Biden‚Äôs favorite meme of him and Barack Obama might be our fave too

author: Brittany Malooly
title: Joe Biden‚Äôs favorite meme of him and Barack Obama might be our fave too
text:
Joe Biden‚Äôs favorite meme of him and Barack Obama might be our fave too Barack Obama and Joe Biden. Sigh. It‚Äôs impossible to put into words just how much we miss these two. As you might recall, to soften the blow from their departure, the internet decided to commemorate their sweet friendship with dozens of memes that we can look at wistfully from time to time when we‚Äôre feeling sad. While Obama once acknowledged the internet‚Äôs obsession with their ‚Äúbromance‚Äù in a speech, the ex-VP hasn‚Äôt said much about it ‚Äî until now. Apparently, Biden LOVED the memes and even has a favorite! Yee!
In a recent interview with Moneyish, Biden‚Äôs daughter, Ashley, said that she was the one who introduced her father to the delightful memes . His reaction? He ‚Äúsat there for an hour and laughed.‚Äù
Yass!
#joebiden #barackobama #presidentobama #vicepresident #meme #memes 
A post shared by ü§óBOOB SQUEEZEü§ó (@fobomemeations) on Mar 14, 2017 at 12:52am PDT 
And his favorite? It‚Äôs this heart-warming meme about Joe wanting to keep their relationship going strong after the presidency. "See? Doesn't this feel right?"
"Joe I'm not leaving my wife for you."
"You said we'd be together forev-"
"8 years. I said 8 years." pic.twitter.com/C2PoAXCD00 
‚Äî Ol' QWERTY Bastard (@TheDiLLon1) October 17, 2016 We loooove this one. Here are some of our other favs :
#barackobama #joebiden #presidentobama #vicepresident #meme #memes 
A post shared by ü§óBOOB SQUEEZEü§ó (@fobomemeations) on Mar 14, 2017 at 12:47am PDT 
LOLOL.
Obama: Wave at the people, Joe.

Biden: IMMA POINT AT'EM

Obama: Please just wave.

Biden: pic.twitter.com/5Y6nuvCzcu 
‚Äî Reverend Scott (@Reverend_Scott) November 29, 2014 Hahah!
Obama: "Joe, why are you still holding my hand?"
Biden: "I wanna freak Mike Pence out" 
Obama: "But why?"
Biden: "Just roll with it" pic.twitter.com/o5KZZ0Ysgz 
‚Äî thomas a moore (@Thomas_A_Moore) November 12, 2016 And how could we forget this one?
Barack: Sign here, and here
Joe: And then the adoption is final & you and Michelle are my parents?
Barack: No, Joe pic.twitter.com/M5yf2SDuFG 
‚Äî Jill Biden (@JillBidenVeep) November 13, 2016 If you don‚Äôt recall, before the pair left the White House, Obama surprised his VP with the Presidential Medal of Freedom , which is the highest award available to a civilian in the U.S. Biden was so moved that he had to turn away from the crowd and the cameras upon finding out and spent the entire ceremony fighting back tears.
Obama called Biden ‚Äúthe best VP America has ever had,‚Äù and explained to Biden that he deserved the award because: ‚Äú[of your] faith in your fellow Americans, for your love of country, and a lifetime of service that will endure through the generations.‚Äù We seriously tear up every time we watch this video.
Obama surprises Joe Biden with special send-off and awards him Presidential Medal of Freedom https://t.co/5icnGfi3Tf https://t.co/vQPI9x2RH4 
‚Äî The Lead CNN (@TheLeadCNN) January 12, 2017 We LOVE that Joe Biden got a kick out of these memes. We hope that we see more of these two very soon.
